attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I currently am in Adult Eduation, I suffer from Multiple Sclerosis. I can't work, and I am married to Nigel who has Dilated Cardiomyopathy.  This is a serious condition; the only treatment for this is to have a heart transplant. We both look forward to our classes; as we are each other's carer's, unpaid I might add.
The Government's so-called funding for this vital service is threatended. Often the centre is unmanned, there is nobody on reception.  I am studying for my Literatracy level 2, its quite hard for me to absorb but I am getting there. We have lots of people who find it very difficult learning.  It is not only older people who need help, we have lots of young particpants. I think that all the people who are currently gaining knowledge will be lost. Where will they go?  
I urge you to think again regarding this essential learning resourse.
Julia Lambson

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
